segments.text: I feel a sense of dread looking at this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot in the puddle, and I worry she's going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so careless, climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, not helping, not warning anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how unaware the woman is of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to intervene, to stop the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know I can't, and that frustrates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone stays safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
